btn_save_and_next: Save and Proceed to Next Step
tip_feishu_config: Log in to Feishu Open Platform, complete configuration according to documentation and publish the application Log in to Backend, How to Configure?
tip_feishu_config_detail: After adding the application, copy APPID and API sercet, encryption information: Encrypt Key, Verification Token, and fill them into the following configuration
tip_copy_url: Copy the following htp address to Application - Events and Callbacks > Subscription Method - Select the request address for sending each event to the developer server
